summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 COVENANT CARGO TRAILER (NA).  THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE CHASSIS WAS ROTTED, INSTEAD OF WELDED AND CUT TOO SHORT IN SEVERAL AREAS.  THE INTEGRITY OF THE TRAILER WAS FLEXING AND SEPARATING.  THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN.  HE CALLED AND EMAILED THE MANUFACTURER, BUT NEVER RECEIVED ASSISTANCE.  THE MILEAGES WERE UNKNOWN.
